tweet: Out of many Proof-of-Stake blockchains, #Cardano is the most thoroughly thought-out one in the entire #crypto universe.   #ADA #blockchain #cryptocurrency #PoS

🔰What and where to check for #Cardano updates? Who to follow? 🤔 The #CardanoCommunity and ecosystem is quite big! Here’s a list of all of our #official community channels, where you can connect with fellow community members & officials around the world!  https://t.co/LiPFbYHXaG

Mental note: next time friends outside crypto or finance reach out and ask "is it still a good time to invest in crypto", go short.  Particularly so if they ask about $ADA.   The one day in 2019 I got the most such inquiries was June 26. For real.
